title: Portfolio Redesign
description: This portfolio you're viewing, built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS.

title: Flame Game
description: An e-commerce website with functioning add-to-cart and checkout features, using mySQL & Express.

title: Code Quiz
description: An interactive timed coding quiz to test your skills, with a highscores page. Built using jQuery and local storage.

title: Eat-Da-Burger
description: A burger-eating app where you can add and eat custom burgers. Built using mySQL and Express Handlebars.

title: Workday Scheduler
description: A web application to help you schedule your workday. Built using Moment.js to display the current time and local storage.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A weather dashboard that uses OpenWeather API to retrieve weather data for cities and maintains a search history using local storage.
